languages.text: "Не смей марать имя слуги Трона, произнося его". {n}Голос дознавателя превращается в сиплое шипение.{/n} "И довольно испытывать мое терпение своей ложью".
"Do not speak his name! You sully the name of a servant of the Throne by uttering it." {n}Heinrix's voice has dropped to a rasping hiss.{/n} "And stop trying my patience with your lies."
languages.original_text: "Не смей марать имя слуги Трона, произнося его". {n}Голос дознавателя превращается в сиплое шипение.{/n} "И довольно испытывать мое терпение своей ложью".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「その名を口にするな！王座の従者の名が汚れる」{n}ハインリックスは、かすれたささやき声になる。{/n}「それと、嘘をついて我が忍耐を試すマネはやめろ」
languages.original_text: "Do not speak his name! You sully the name of a servant of the Throne by uttering it." {n}Heinrix's voice has dropped to a rasping hiss.{/n} "And stop trying my patience with your lies."

traits.locale_text: 「その名を口にするな！王座の従者の名が汚れる」{n}ハインリックスは、かすれたささやき声になる。{/n}「それと、嘘をついて我が忍耐を試すマネはやめろ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “住口！你说出他的名字，是对神皇忠仆的侮辱。”{n}海因里希压低了声音，发出犹如毒蛇吐信的嘶鸣。{/n}“还有，别再用你的谎言来考验我的耐心。”
languages.original_text: "Do not speak his name! You sully the name of a servant of the Throne by uttering it." {n}Heinrix's voice has dropped to a rasping hiss.{/n} "And stop trying my patience with your lies."

traits.locale_text: “住口！你说出他的名字，是对神皇忠仆的侮辱。”{n}海因里希压低了声音，发出犹如毒蛇吐信的嘶鸣。{/n}“还有，别再用你的谎言来考验我的耐心。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ne prononcez pas le nom de ce serviteur du Trône ! Vous le souillez en le laissant franchir vos lèvres. {n}La voix d'Heinrix se mue en un sifflement rauque.{/n} Et cessez de mettre ma patience à l'épreuve avec vos mensonges. »
languages.original_text: "Do not speak his name! You sully the name of a servant of the Throne by uttering it." {n}Heinrix's voice has dropped to a rasping hiss.{/n} "And stop trying my patience with your lies."

traits.locale_text: « Ne prononcez pas le nom de ce serviteur du Trône ! Vous le souillez en le laissant franchir vos lèvres. {n}La voix d'Heinrix se mue en un sifflement rauque.{/n} Et cessez de mettre ma patience à l'épreuve avec vos mensonges. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¡No pronuncies su nombre! ¡Estarías mancillando a un siervo del Trono!». {n}La voz de Heinrix se reduce a un siseo seco.{/n} «Y deja de poner a prueba mi paciencia con tus mentiras».
languages.original_text: "Do not speak his name! You sully the name of a servant of the Throne by uttering it." {n}Heinrix's voice has dropped to a rasping hiss.{/n} "And stop trying my patience with your lies."

traits.locale_text: «¡No pronuncies su nombre! ¡Estarías mancillando a un siervo del Trono!». {n}La voz de Heinrix se reduce a un siseo seco.{/n} «Y deja de poner a prueba mi paciencia con tus mentiras».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sagt nicht seinen Namen! Ihr besudelt den Namen eines Dieners des Throns, indem ihr ihn aussprecht." {n}Heinrixs Stimme ist nur noch ein rasselndes Flüstern.{/n} "Und hört auf, meine Geduld mit Euren Lügen auf die Probe zu stellen."
languages.original_text: "Do not speak his name! You sully the name of a servant of the Throne by uttering it." {n}Heinrix's voice has dropped to a rasping hiss.{/n} "And stop trying my patience with your lies."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt nicht seinen Namen! Ihr besudelt den Namen eines Dieners des Throns, indem ihr ihn aussprecht." {n}Heinrixs Stimme ist nur noch ein rasselndes Flüstern.{/n} "Und hört auf, meine Geduld mit Euren Lügen auf die Probe zu stellen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Onun adını anmayacaksın! Taht'ın bir hizmetkârının adını ağzına alarak kirletmene izin vermem." {n}Heinrix, kulak tırmalayan bir tıslama saçarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Yalanlarınla sabrımı zorlama."
languages.original_text: "Do not speak his name! You sully the name of a servant of the Throne by uttering it." {n}Heinrix's voice has dropped to a rasping hiss.{/n} "And stop trying my patience with your lies."

traits.locale_text: "Onun adını söylemeyeceksin! Taht'ın bir hizmetkârının adını ağzına alarak kirletmene izin vermem." {n}Heinrix, kulak tırmalayacak bir şekilde tıslayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Yalanlarınla sabrımı zorlama."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
